item.title: Consistency management in distributed settings
item.description: Consistency management in distributed settings Disclaimer I just participate in numerous design discussions related to genomu development. However all ideas and 99% of the implementation due to @yrashk. I decided to write this post to document the design of genomu inspite the fact that this great development didn’t take off. Introduction Being a consultancy agency we had a client who have ordered a development of a backend for a system for doing sport events betting.
